subheaderTitle: I will create your dream website!
subheaderParagraph: I am profesionals who can help you with your idea.
problemSolutionHeader: Do you want to have your own website but don't know where to start?
problemSolutionParagraph: Nowadays, there are many possibilities to create your website, but unfortunately when you start looking for information, it turns out that it is a very complex problem! Words such as domain, SEO or HTML will be mentioned.  You need to spend a lot of time to understand how websites are positioned by search engines, which websites attract more customers and why, or what responsiveness is... Don't worry, I'll help you!
problemSolutionListTitle: By working with me, you will get a website:
problemSolutionBullet1: built according to the latest design trends
problemSolutionBullet3: containing the latest psychological techniques to retain customers and increase the chance of contacting you
problemSolutionBullet4: looking exactly the way you want
